org.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE projects.status <> 9 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking') IS NOT NULL AND issues.id = "$1" LIMIT 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE projects.status <> 9 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking' LIMIT 1) IS NOT NULL AND issues.id = "$1" LIMIT 1
